org.melior.util.string

Interface StringUtil


  • public interface StringUtil
    Utility functions that scan or modify strings. The functions are null safe.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Melior

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • substring

        static String substring(String string,
                        int offset,
                        int length)
        Return substring of string. If the string is null the result is null. If the length is 0 the result is the empty string.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        offset - The offset
        length - The required length
        Returns:
        The substring, or an empty string if the length is 0

      • substringBetween

        static String substringBetween(String string,
                               String open,
                               String close)
        Return substring of string between opening token and closing token. If the string is null or the opening token is null or the closing token is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        open - The opening token
        close - The closing token
        Returns:
        The substring, or null if either the opening token or the closing token is not present

      • substringBefore

        static String substringBefore(String string,
                              String token)
        Return substring of string preceding token. If the string is null or the token is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        token - The token
        Returns:
        The substring, or null if the token is not present

      • substringAfter

        static String substringAfter(String string,
                             String token)
        Return substring of string following token. If the string is null or the token is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        token - The token
        Returns:
        The substring, or null if the token is not present

      • toUpperCase

        static String toUpperCase(String string)
        Convert string to upper case. If the string is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        Returns:
        The converted string

        Convert string to lower case. If the string is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        Returns:
        The converted string

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • trimRight

        static String trimRight(String string)
        Trim trailing whitespace from string. If the string is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to trim
        Returns:
        The trimmed string

      • padLeft

        static String padLeft(String string,
                      int length,
                      String padding)
        Pad string with leading padding up to the specified length. If the string is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        length - The length
        padding - The padding
        Returns:
        The padded string

      • padRight

        static String padRight(String string,
                       int length,
                       String padding)
        Pad string with trailing padding up to the specified length. If the string is null the result is null.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        length - The length
        padding - The padding
        Returns:
        The padded string

      • startsWith

        static boolean startsWith(String string,
                          String prefix)
        Check whether string has prefix. If the string is null the result is false.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        prefix - The prefix
        Returns:
        true if the string has the prefix, false otherwise

      • endsWith

        static boolean endsWith(String string,
                        String postfix)
        Check whether string has post-fix. If the string is null the result is false.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        postfix - The post-fix
        Returns:
        true if the string has the post-fix, false otherwise

      • contentEqual

        static boolean contentEqual(String string1,
                            String string2)
        Check whether strings have equal content.
        Parameters:
        string1 - The first string
        string2 - The second string
        Returns:
        true if the strings have equal content, false otherwise

        Check whether string contains substring.
        Parameters:

        @SafeVarargs
static <T> String join(T... objects)
        Join String representation of objects together. If the array of objects is null the result is null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type
        Parameters:
        objects - The array of objects
        Returns:
        The concatenated string

      • replaceAll

        static String replaceAll(String string,
                         String substring,
                         String replacement)
        Replace all occurrences of substring in string. If the string is null the result is null. If the substring is null or the replacement is null, the string will remain unchanged.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        substring - The substring
        replacement - The replacement
        Returns:
        The result string

      • replaceAll

        static void replaceAll(StringBuilder stringBuilder,
                       String substring,
                       String replacement)
        Replace all occurrences of substring in StringBuilder. If the StringBuilder is null the result is null. If the substring is null or the replacement is null, the StringBuilder will remain unchanged.
        Parameters:
        stringBuilder - The string builder
        substring - The substring
        replacement - The replacement

      • requireNonEmpty

        static void requireNonEmpty(String string,
                            String message)
                     throws ApplicationException
        Require string to not be null and not be empty. If the string is null or is empty then an exception is raised with the message.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        message - The message
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - if the string is null or is empty

      • emptyToNull

        static String emptyToNull(String string)
        Return null if string is null or empty.
        Parameters:
        string - The string
        Returns:
        The string, or null if the string is null or empty
